string.text: The military flamethrower, 'Thunder-10', make by the engineers at the military base Kashalot-1. It is designed on the basis of the weapon 'ThunderStorm'. Ammunition: flamethrower charge of VOG-40.
The manual mine, utilized for military purposes for the protection of perimeters. \n Radius - 1м. Damage - 20. Time of activation 10 seconds.
The improved manual mine. It is famous for its power and radius of damage. \n Radius - 3м. Damage - 35. Time of activation 10 seconds.
The newest development of military scientists. When activated the enemy is killed by an electrical discharge. \n Radius - 6м. Damage - 60. Time of activation 10 seconds.
